name: Swordmin's Dream Demo
description:
happy new year!!!

welcome to the very very placeholder swordmin's dream page!!!

if you've managed to get here congratulations!! i think you're cool

PLEASE oh PLEASE try to parry stuff a lot!! the input for it is back + block!!

SWORDMIN'S DREAM is a minimalist fighting game I'm making to teach myself how fighting games work at a programming level, so I can go on to make a silly maximalist fighting game about bears.

currently it's two-player only, and you need at least one controller to play. keyboard is supported though!!

keyboard controls are as follows:

  • J/I/L are light, heavy and kick respectively
  • K is block
  • WASD/arrow keys move

please report any weird bugs you find!! the big three I already know about are:

  • the character select screen sometimes goofs up and has one controller controlling both characters (just back out and try assign again)
  • the cancel system sometimes breaks and lets you repeatedly cancel moves too early
  • when both players die when one has 3 wins sometimes it goes for another round

anything else is unknown to me!
